meanings.definition: To count backwards from a certain number.
meanings.sent1: I will countback from ten to one before we start the game.
meanings.sent2: Remember to countback from twenty to zero when playing hide and seek.
meanings.sent3: I tried to countback from five to three, but I accidentally skipped a number!
meanings.sent4: As the fireworks lit up the sky, I felt like I was countbacking through time.
meanings.sent5: The teacher asked us to countback from fifty by threes to practice our math skills.

meanings.definition: A method of determining the winner in a tied election by counting back to previous rounds of voting.
meanings.sent1: The countback method was used to decide the winner of the election.
meanings.sent2: In case of a tie, the countback process helps identify the victor.
meanings.sent3: It was quite a sight to see the countback being used to break the tie in the election.
meanings.sent4: The countback system can sometimes lead to unexpected outcomes in close races.
meanings.sent5: The tension in the room was palpable as they awaited the results of the countback.
